keyPolicies.policyDescription: No to a second referendum, yes to a real Brexit, avoid a rigged second referendum overseen by a Corbyn-led Remainer alliance, not extending the transition period beyond 2020.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Vote for the Brexit Party to prevent a Corbyn's Labour and Remainer alliance; in many Leave-voting Labour seats, the Tories have never won and can't win this time.

issues.brexitEurope: Priority is to stop a Corbyn-led Remainer alliance from overturning Brexit with a rigged second referendum. Need to hold Boris to his word by electing Brexit Party MPs.
issues.governance: Parliament's betrayal of our vote proves the political system is broken. Need big democratic reforms to make Parliament serve the People.

images.caption: Nigel Farage MEP, Leader of the Brexit Party
